name: containerar
description: The container used to start an AR experience

author: Mendix

scripts.buildAllNative: npm run --prefix "./Native/Container" build & npm run --prefix "./Native/3DObject" build & npm run --prefix "./Native/Cube" build & npm run --prefix "./Native/ImageTracker" build &  npm run --prefix "./Native/Node" build &  npm run --prefix "./Native/Sphere" build &  npm run --prefix "./Native/Square" build
scripts.buildAllWeb: npm run --prefix "./Web/Container" build & npm run --prefix "./Web/Cube" build
